title: go.exp/fsnotify: possible shadowing bug
body:
This looks like a real shadowing bug but I can't make the tests pass with or without a
fix. Expert needed?

go.exp/fsnotify/fsnotify_bsd.go:161: declaration of path shadows declaration at
/Users/r/src/code.google.com/p/go.exp/fsnotify/fsnotify_bsd.go:130
